message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $130. I know it's worth more to me, but I'm hoping we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and mine.

Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I appreciate your interest.  While $100 is a bit lower than I hoped for, I'm willing to come down to $120. I think this is a fair compromise that allows us both to get a good deal.

I understand your position, Alice. Thank you for considering my previous counteroffer. I would like to propose a final price of $110 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our interests.
